title: error: internal compiler error: trimmed_def_paths constructed

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
I came across this while working on #89737. Sadly I wasn't really able to minimize this.

1. Checkout this branch: https://github.com/r00ster91/rust/tree/uselog10 and go to 428a47987a4943525d50ea4f80fb6cb1b4bce58c (but other commits will likely work too).
2. Go to https://github.com/r00ster91/rust/blob/428a47987a4943525d50ea4f80fb6cb1b4bce58c/library/alloc/src/string.rs#L2363 and paste in the following:
```rs
fn x<T>(val: &T) {
    let mut buf = String::new();
    let mut formatter = core::fmt::Formatter::new(&mut buf);
    fmt::Display::fmt(val, &mut formatter).unwrap();
}
```
